name: WayWord
description:
Welcome to Wayword! 

A game where you use words to take a way!

As a postman in the City of Wayword, you have to deliver letters to take care of the community. Type on your keyboard as fast as you can to move throughout the city and don't forget, you have limited time to deliver all letters!

Tolly AgentOfBurgundy Kulczycki - Programming and Management
Marie MortyNo99 Sielecki - Art Direction, UI and Asset Design
Julia plumegnis Osiecka - Sound Design
Pola Sunflowery Aleksandrowicz - Character Art
Jakub MrPatapon Mrozicki - System and UI Design
Jakub ImSoAgnes Charczuk - QA

Special thanks to Alexzel
